title: Ransomware Containment
description: An incident responder must contain a ransomware outbreak that is actively spreading across the network.

tasks.description: Identify the initially infected host from the EDR alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder correctly identifies the patient zero machine.

tasks.description: Immediately isolate the infected host from the network using the EDR tool to stop it from spreading the ransomware further.
Block the command-and-control (C2) IP address identified in the malware's traffic at the network firewall.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder successfully blocks the C2 communication, preventing the ransomware from receiving new instructions.
